links.title: FAQs
links.content:
[![](images/Check-Cap_Logo__min.png)](https://www.check-cap.com/)

[](https://twitter.com/CheckCap_ "Twitter")

Twitter

[](https://www.linkedin.com/company/check-cap-ltd-/ "LinkedIn")

LinkedIn

[Careers](https://check-cap.com/career/)

#  FAQs 

  1. [Home](https://www.check-cap.com/)
  2. [Investors](https://ir.check-cap.com/home)



Which exchange do Check-Cap shares trade on?

Check-Cap ordinary shares trade on the NASDAQ Capital Market under the symbol “CHEK”. The Series A Warrants traded under the symbol “CHEKW” expired on February 24, 2020 and ceased to be listed on the Nasdaq Capital Market since February 20, 2020. Since May 8, 2018, Check Cap Series C Warrants have also been listed on the Nasdaq Capital Market under the symbol “CHEKZ”.

Where is the company located?

Check-Cap is located at:

Check-Cap Ltd. 29 Abba Hushi Ave. P.O.Box 1271 Isfiya 3009000 Israel

Does Check-Cap offer a direct stock purchase program?

Check-Cap does not offer a direct stock purchase program.

When is Check-Cap’s fiscal year end?

Check-Cap’s fiscal year ends on December 31.

How can I obtain Check-Cap’s SEC filings?

Check-Cap’s SEC filings, including its annual report, quarterly earnings releases and other investor materials are available under “SEC Filings” in the “Investors” section of our corporate website. Additionally, all SEC filings can also be accessed directly from the SEC at [www.sec.gov](http://www.sec.gov).

Does Check-Cap plan to pay a cash dividend?

Check-Cap does not anticipate paying any cash dividends in the foreseeable future.

Who is Check-Cap’s transfer agent?

The transfer agent and registrar for Check-Cap is: 

American Stock Transfer & Trust Company, LLC 6201 15th Avenue Brooklyn, New York 11219 T: (800) 937-5449 (U.S.) or (718) 921-8200 (International).

How do I contact Investor Relations?

Click [here ](contact-us)to contact Investor Relations.

Is there a way to receive Check-Cap press releases and notice of upcoming events via email?

Click [here ](email-alerts)to sign up for email alerts.

Who can I contact if I am a member of the media?

If you are a member of the media, please click [here ](contact-us)to contact Check-Cap.

(For investors) How do I register my Check-Cap ordinary shares in my name? 

Investors who wish to register their ordinary shares in their own name or transfer their shares out of “street name” should consult their broker.

(For brokers) How do I register Check-Cap ordinary shares in the holder’s name or transfer the shares out of “street name?”

Please check within your firm’s operations department for guidance on registering ordinary shares out of “street name.”

[](# "Back to top") [Menu](javascript:void\(0\);)
